item.title: Apple ordered to open up in-app purchases in Brazil
item.description:
Brazil’s antitrust regulator Cade has ruled that Apple must lift restrictions on in-app purchases within 20 days, Reuters reports. Otherwise, if the iPhone maker doesn’t comply, it faces fines of $43,000 per day. This decision is the result of a complaint filed by e-commerce merchant Mercado Libre in 2022. If you’ve been following recent changes […]

item.title: AI helps India’s Meesho cut some customer call costs by 75%
item.description:
Softbank-backed online shopping site Meesho has rolled out what it claims is the first GenAI-powered voice bot among Indian e-commerce firms for customer support, paring down some expenses by 75%. GenAI, or generative AI, refers to artificial intelligence models that are trained on lots of data so that they are capable of producing and parsing […]

item.title: Orange partners with OpenAI, Meta to develop custom African-language AI models
item.description: Orange is working with OpenAI and Meta to build custom AI models that can understand West African languages not understood by most conversational systems.

item.title: Tesla Cybertruck Reportedly Needed Full Battery Replacement Before Owner Drove It A Single Mile
Your favorite shutterbug is going to lose it over this teeny tiny keychain camera
item.description: The Retro Mini Keychain Camera is fully functional and can snap photos and shoot video, and it's on sale for 50% off.

item.title: Double the screens, double the holiday cheer with this laptop screen extender
item.description: The DUEX Plus portable laptop screen extender is a great gift for multitaskers, on sale ahead of Black Friday.

item.title: Sonos Ace headphones have dropped to their lowest-ever price in Amazons Black Friday sale
item.description: As of Nov. 26, Sonos Ace headphones have dropped to $349 in Black Friday sales. Normally they retail for $449.

item.title: The 40mm Apple Watch SE has dropped to its lowest-ever price this Black Friday
item.description: Apple Watch SE (40mm, GPS) usually retails for $249. As of Nov. 26, it's discounted to $149 in Black Friday sales.

item.title: Save $250 on the PlayStation VR 2 Horizon Call of The Mountain bundle this Black Friday
item.description: PlayStation VR 2's 'Horizon Call of The Mountain' bundle is usually listed for $599.99. As of Nov. 26, it's on sale for $349.
